name: The Rapture (Fresh Networks)
description:
Play as a wealthy man who was left behind when the rapture occured.

How to Play:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

Left Click - Attack

Right Click - Block/FireBall

Slay your demons!

Developer Insight:

This game was made as my first major project. It had began and started to allow me to learn unity. I first started making the game using Bolt visual scripting to learn the ropes of unity then moved to C#.
